creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
description: large male figure standing on back of small ox with PR foot on ox\'s head; fists clenched and elbows bent; figure wearing two curled horned helmet with peacock sitting on top and costume elaborately painted with floral motif in red, white, green, pink and blue with gold details; face and hands painted a pinkish orange with detailed beard and moustache
title: Lokapala
